name: web-pvolve-automation
description: Automation testing for Pvolve Web App

scripts.cy:qa:runall: npm run allure:reportcleanup && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport
scripts.cy:qa:runall.windows: npm run allure:reportcleanup.windows && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport
scripts.cy:qa:runall.mac: npm run allure:reportcleanup.mac && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport
scripts.cy:qa:smoke: npm run allure:reportcleanup && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env grepTags=@smoke,allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport
scripts.cy:qa:smoke.mac: npm run allure:reportcleanup.mac && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env grepTags=@smoke,allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport
scripts.cy:qa:smoke.windows: npm run allure:reportcleanup.windows && cypress run --browser chrome --headless --env grepTags=@smoke,allure=true,envFile=qa,testFile=all_tests; npm run allure:generatereport && npm run allure:openreport

scripts.allure:reportcleanup: delete -r allure-report allure-results || mkdir allure-report allure-results
scripts.allure:reportcleanup.windows: rd /s /q allure-report allure-results || mkdir allure-report allure-results
scripts.allure:reportcleanup.mac: rm -r allure-report allure-results || mkdir allure-report allure-results

author: Myles Glass
